name: Trek_modal
xml:
<field
	type="ModalSelect"
	name="trek_modal"
	label="The trek path modal"
	sql_title_table="#__###component###_place"
	sql_title_column="place"
	sql_title_key="id"
	urlSelect="/Joomla_5/administrator/index.php?option=com_###component###&view=places&layout=modal&tmpl=component&titleKey=id"
	urlNew="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=targetview.add&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	urlEdit="index.php?option=com_###component###&task=targetview.edit&id={id}&layout=modal&tmpl=component"
	titleSelect="Select Targetview"
	titleNew="New Targetview"
	titleEdit="Edit Targetview"
	iconSelect="icon-copy"
	select="true"
	new="false"
	edit="false"
	clear="true"
	required="false"
	class="input-large"
	description=""
	hint="Select a Targetview"
	default=""
	readonly="false"
	disabled="false"
	showon=""
/>
